meaningMnemonic: The <radical>bow</radical> radical and the <kanji>bow</kanji> kanji are exactly the same!
readingMnemonic: You have a <kanji>bow</kanji> in one hand and in the other... a <reading>cu</reading>cumber (きゅう). You're going to shoot this cucumber with this bow into the salad you're making. Many people don't know this, but this makes your cucumbers taste better.
